announcements.title: âš ï¸ Wake-up Feature Risk Notice
announcements.summary: Google has recently tightened controls on API model conversation calls. Wake-up is typically low-frequency and currently appears to have limited risk, but account risk-control can still be triggered.
announcements.content:
Google has recently tightened risk controls on API model conversation calls.

Compared with high-frequency reverse-proxy usage, the wake-up feature is typically low-frequency. Based on current observations, the overall risk may not be high.

However, please note that using wake-up can still increase the chance of account risk-control events (including but not limited to additional verification, temporary restrictions, or abnormal checks).

Please enable and use it cautiously based on your account situation, and assess the risk yourself.
